Key Match Events: India chased down a target of 159-8 with 4 wickets remaining in the final over.
Virat Kohli scored an unbeaten 82 to lead India's victory.
Post-Match Reflections: India captain Rohit Sharma praised Virat Kohli's performance.
Virat Kohli expressed his feelings about the win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India have dominated Pakistan since the late 1990s but lost two of their three previous clashes including by 10 wickets in the group phase at last yearâ€™s T20 World Cup as well as losing the Asia Cup Super 4 match.
Others: The match was played at the Melbourne Cricket Ground in front of 90,000 fans.
India's victory was critical in a group that also includes Bangladesh, South Africa, and qualifiers the Netherlands and Zimbabwe.
